body:
Change your firebase json file to

{
  "database": {
    "rules": "database.rules.json"
  },
  "hosting": {
    "public": "public",
    "rewrites": [
    ]
  }
}

If you are still having issues then you also have to change your database file to 

{
  "rules": {
    ".read": "auth != null",
    ".write": "auth != null"
  }
}
